verses.verse: Nevertheless the dimness <S%H4155><s%> shall not be such as was in her vexation <S%H4164><s%>, when <S%H6256><s%> at the first <S%H7223><s%> he lightly afflicted <S%H7043><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, and afterward <S%H314><s%> did more grievously afflict <S%H3513><s%> her by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

The people <S%H5971><s%> that walked <S%H1980><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> light <S%H216><s%>: they that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>, upon them hath the light <S%H216><s%> shined <S%H5050><s%>.

Thou hast multiplied <S%H7235><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%>, and not increased <S%H1431><s%> the joy <S%H8057><s%>: they joy <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee according to the joy <S%H8057><s%> in harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and as men rejoice <S%H1523><s%> when they divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>.

For thou hast broken <S%H2865><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of his burden <S%H5448><s%>, and the staff <S%H4294><s%> of his shoulder <S%H7926><s%>, the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his oppressor <S%H5065><s%>, as in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>.

For every battle <S%H5430><s%> of the warrior <S%H5431><s%> is with confused noise <S%H7494><s%>, and garments <S%H8071><s%> rolled <S%H1556><s%> in blood <S%H1818><s%>; but this shall be with burning <S%H8316><s%> and fuel <S%H3980><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>.

For unto us a child <S%H3206><s%> is born <S%H3205><s%>, unto us a son <S%H1121><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%>: and the government <S%H4951><s%> shall be upon his shoulder <S%H7926><s%>: and his name <S%H8034><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> Wonderful <S%H6382><s%>, Counseller <S%H3289><s%>, The mighty <S%H1368><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, The everlasting <S%H5703><s%> Father <S%H1><s%>, The Prince <S%H8269><s%> of Peace <S%H7965><s%>.

Of the increase <S%H4766><s%> of his government <S%H4951><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> there shall be no end <S%H7093><s%>, upon the throne <S%H3678><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and upon his kingdom <S%H4467><s%>, to order <S%H3559><s%> it, and to establish <S%H5582><s%> it with judgment <S%H4941><s%> and with justice <S%H6666><s%> from henceforth even for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>. The zeal <S%H7068><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> will perform <S%H6213><s%> this.
¶ The Lord <S%H136><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> into Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and it hath lighted <S%H5307><s%> upon Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%>, even Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, that say <S%H559><s%> in the pride <S%H1346><s%> and stoutness <S%H1433><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>,

The bricks <S%H3843><s%> are fallen down <S%H5307><s%>, but we will build <S%H1129><s%> with hewn stones <S%H1496><s%>: the sycomores <S%H8256><s%> are cut down <S%H1438><s%>, but we will change <S%H2498><s%> them into cedars <S%H730><s%>.
Therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall set up <S%H7682><s%> the adversaries <S%H6862><s%> of Rezin <S%H7526><s%> against him, and join <S%H5526><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> together <S%H5526><s%>;

The Syrians <S%H758><s%> before <S%H6924><s%>, and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> behind <S%H268><s%>; and they shall devour <S%H398><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with open mouth <S%H6310><s%>. For all this his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned away <S%H7725><s%>, but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out still <S%H5186><s%>.
¶ For the people <S%H5971><s%> turneth <S%H7725><s%> not unto him that smiteth <S%H5221><s%> them, neither do they seek <S%H1875><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from Israel <S%H3478><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> and tail <S%H2180><s%>, branch <S%H3712><s%> and rush <S%H100><s%>, in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

The ancient <S%H2205><s%> and honourable <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5375><s%>, he <S%H1931><s%> is the head <S%H7218><s%>; and the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that teacheth <S%H3384><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%>, he is the tail <S%H2180><s%>.
For the leaders <S%H833><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> cause them to err <S%H8582><s%>; and they that are led <S%H833><s%> of them are destroyed <S%H1104><s%>.

Therefore the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall have no joy <S%H8055><s%> in their young men <S%H970><s%>, neither shall have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on their fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widows <S%H490><s%>: for every one is an hypocrite <S%H2611><s%> and an evildoer <S%H7489><s%>, and every mouth <S%H6310><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%>. For all this his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned away <S%H7725><s%>, but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out still <S%H5186><s%>.

¶ For wickedness <S%H7564><s%> burneth <S%H1197><s%> as the fire <S%H784><s%>: it shall devour <S%H398><s%> the briers <S%H8068><s%> and thorns <S%H7898><s%>, and shall kindle <S%H3341><s%> in the thickets <S%H5442><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>, and they shall mount up <S%H55><s%> like the lifting up <S%H1348><s%> of smoke <S%H6227><s%>.

Through the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> darkened <S%H6272><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> shall be as the fuel <S%H3980><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>: no man <S%H376><s%> shall spare <S%H2550><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>.

And he shall snatch <S%H1504><s%> on the right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and be hungry <S%H7457><s%>; and he shall eat <S%H398><s%> on the left hand <S%H8040><s%>, and they shall not be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>: they shall eat <S%H398><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his own arm <S%H2220><s%>:

Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, Ephraim <S%H669><s%>; and Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: and they together <S%H3162><s%> shall be against Judah <S%H3063><s%>. For all this his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned away <S%H7725><s%>, but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out still <S%H5186><s%>.
